record.name: Send Notification when Problem has resolution

rule.ruleDesc: Send HTML Email: PM.Resolution to Problem Coordinators
rule.condition: rcStatus in $L.file="Resolved" and not (same(rcStatus in $L.file.save, rcStatus in $L.file))
rule.conditionDesc: ( rcStatus in CurrentRecord = "Resolved" AND rcStatus in SavedRecord != rcStatus in CurrentRecord)
rule.conditionXML: <XmlCondition><collection logical="" negate="" ><condition logical="" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Problem Status">rcStatus</FieldName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="string">Resolved</Value></condition><condition logical="AND" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>SavedRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Problem Status">rcStatus</FieldName></operand><Comparison>neq</Comparison><Value type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Problem Status">rcStatus</FieldName></Value></condition></collection></XmlCondition>
rule.fullDesc: Send HTML Email: PM.Resolution to Problem Coordinators (when ( rcStatus in CurrentRecord = "Resolved" AND rcStatus in SavedRecord != rcStatus in CurrentRecord))
